PLAY!
The world is quiet... for now.
No news yet...
The dark ritual is almost ready!
The dark ritual is ready!
Forbidden symbol
A simple scribble on the wall. It attracts tiny particles of the attention of the Ancients.
If you look at this symbol for a long time, you will feel a little uneasy.
Forbidden word
Phonetic anomaly. An unclean word in a forbidden language.
If you say this out loud, a strange, unpleasant taste appears in your mouth.
Forbidden spell
A combination of forbidden words filled with sinister magical power.
If you misplace the stress, you can accidentally cause it to rain squid.
Forbidden text
Pages of incoherent nonsense, in which a frightening logic is visible.
The ink is still wet, although this manuscript is clearly very old.
Forbidden folio
A heavy, leather-bound book. Containing within it a multitude of secrets of absolute evil.
A leather cover... belonging to one of the former owners.
Forbidden grimoire
An ancient book whose secrets are revealed only to the most initiated.
A single glance at these pages forever changes those who look.
Neophyte
A passerby, gazing at the signs. Almost free labor.
He came for the truth, but received a mantle and an internship in the abyss.
Cultist
A devoted follower who has served the cult for many years.
Has the ability to never ask stupid questions. None. Ever.
Ritualist
Initiated into the most secretive secrets, he no longer quite resembles a human being... He can draw a perfect circle without a compass.
Even demons fear him for his strict adherence to safety precautions.
Forbidden altar
A pulpit for reading ritual texts. It promotes the spread of dark teachings.
The air around the pedestal is so heavy that ordinary candles go out near it.
Forbidden monolith
A block of black stone
column3: humming at the frequency of your fear.

column2: If you press your ear to it, you can hear the Universe asking to reboot.
Forbidden sanctuary
A place where the geometry of the walls violates all the laws of physics.
Here time goes in the other direction, just so as not to disturb you.
Forbidden credence
A facility for the mass conversion of resources into filth.
Sacrifice is not a loss, but a contribution to survival during the apocalypse.
Forbidden temple
A gloomy building within whose walls evil itself has taken up residence.
The architect went crazy at the foundation stage. It was a condition of the tender.
Forbidden cathedral
The pinnacle of worship. The gates to R'lyeh begin to open.
Here the walls breathe, and the stained glass windows look into the soul. Ph'nglui mglv'nafkh!
You saw a strange sign and wrote it down
You have seen something that can never be unseen
You have learned the forbidden word
All the insects have escaped from your house
You have learned to practice forbidden magic
You no longer need sleep and food
Ordinary people avoid you, they are unable to accept the truth
You will learn forbidden secrets
Your forbidden library is growing
You comprehend the secrets of the universe
The truth has been revealed to you and you are ready to share it
You have your first followers
Ordinary citizens don't suspect anything yet...
Your followers are growing
Your cult grows and rumors begin to circulate about it
Everyone in your circle wears the same clothes
People avoid your house
Strange things start happening in your city
All the plants near your house have died
Ordinary townspeople begin to suspect something...
The forbidden monolith drives away all non-believers in the area
The monoliths glow pleasantly at night from the filth that fills them
People are starting to disappear in your city
Popular rumors are turning into mass discontent
Constant weather anomalies are no longer surprising
People are sheltering in their homes and a curfew has been imposed in the city
Your sacrifices please the forbidden god and bear fruit
Armed men patrol the streets and look for suspicious passersby
You built a temple! Now this city is doomed
Fear of your cult fills this city!
Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh vgah'nagl fhtagn
Ya! Ya! Cthulhu fhtagn!
